summary: Both previously reported issues are resolved: the policy header is now set for health/kill-switch paths and the 429 policy override is constrained to allowed dimensions.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: X-RateLimit-Policy missing on some agent responses (kill-switch and /api/agents/health)
previous_issues_status.notes: Default header middleware now runs before kill switch and is explicitly applied to the health route.
Dimension is now validated against an allowlist before setting the header.
